title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 327.4 - Date of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 327.4 - Date of hearing

State Regulations
(a) The chair shall from time to time prepare calendars of disputed bills (other
than those in which compensability has not yet been established) and shall
arrange the time and place of hearings. (b) The chair, at least 30 days prior to the
date set for any hearing, shall mail notice of the hearing, stating the time
and place thereof, to the carrier and to the hospital which rendered the
bill. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
327.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
